arabicText: يَعْتَذِرُونَ إِلَيْكُمْ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ ۚ قُل لَّا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكُمْ قَدْ نَبَّأَنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنْ أَخْبَارِكُمْ ۚ وَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	make	excuses	 to	 you	when	 you	
return	to	them;	say,	“Do	not	make	excuses	
- we	 shall	 never	 believe	 you	 - Allah has	
given	 us	 your	 tidings;	 and	 Allah and	 His	
Noble	Messenger	will	now	see	your	deeds,	
and	 then	 you	 will	 return	 to	 Him	 Who	
knows	 everything,	 the	 hidden	 and	 the	
visible	- He	will	inform	you	of	all	what	you	
used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	bahāne	banāyeñ	ge jab	tum	un	ki	
taraf	 laut	 kar	 jāoge	 tum	 farmānā	 bahāne	
na	banāo	hum	hargiz	 tumhārā	yaqeen	na	
kareiñ	 ge	 Allāh	 ne	 hameiñ	 tumhāri	
khabreñ	de	di	haiñ	aur	ab	Allāh	wa	Rasool	
tumhāre	 kām	 dekheñ	 ge	 phir	 us	 ki	 taraf	
palat	kar	jāoge	jo	chupe	aur	zāhir	sab	ko	
jāntā	 hai	 woh	 tumhe	 jatā	 dega	 jo	 kuch	
tum	karte	the

arabicText: سَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لِتُعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ فَأَعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ رِجْسٌۭ ۖ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. They	will	now	swear	by	Allah before	you,	
when	 you	 return	 to	 them,	 in	 order	 that	
you	 do	 not	 pay	 attention	 to	 them;	 so	 do	
not	 bother	 about	 them;	 they	 are	 indeed	
filthy;	 and	 their	 destination	 is	 hell;	 the	
reward	of	what	they	used	to	earn.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	 tumhāre	āage	Allāh	 ki	 qasam	 khāyeiñ	
ge	 jab	 tum	 un	 ki	 taraf	 palat	 kar	 jāoge	 is	
liye	 ke	 tum	 un	 ke	 khayāl	 me	 na	 pado	 to	
hāñ	tum	un	ke	khayāl	chhodo	woh	to	nire	
(bilkul) paleed	 haiñ	 aur	 unkā	 thikāna	
Jahannam	hai	badlā	us	kā	jo	kamāte	the

arabicText: يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ لِتَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ فَإِن تَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرْضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	 swear	 before	 you	 that	 you	 may	 be	
pleased	 with	 them;	 so	 if	 you	 become	
pleased	with	them,	then	indeed	Allah will	
never	be	pleased	with	the	sinful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāre	 āge	 qasmeiñ	 khāte	 haiñ	 ki	 tum	
un	se	rāzi	ho	jāo	to	agar	tum	un	se	rāzi	ho	
jāo	 to	 beshak	Allāh	 to	 fāsiq	logoñ	 se	 rāzi	
na	hogā

arabicText: ٱلْأَعْرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفْرًۭا وَنِفَاقًۭا وَأَجْدَرُ أَلَّا يَعْلَمُوا۟ حُدُودَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	ignorant	are	more	severe	in	disbelief	
and	 hypocrisy,	 and	 deserve	 to	 remain	
ignorant	 of	 the	 commands	 which	 Allah
has	revealed	to	His	Noble	Messenger;	and	
Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Gañwār	 kufr	 aur	 nifāq	 me	 ziyāda	 sakht	
haiñ	aur	isi	qābil	haiñ	ki	Allāh	ne	jo	hukm	
apne	 Rasool	 par utāre	 us	 se	 jāhil	 raheñ	
aur	Allah	‘Ilm-o-Hikmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ مَغْرَمًۭا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَآئِرَ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 some	 of	 the	 ignorant	 are	 those	 who	
when	 spending	in	Allah's	 cause	 consider	it	 a	 ransom,	 and	 await	 the	 coming	 of	 the	 cycles	(of	
misfortunes)	upon	you;	upon	them	only	is	the	evil	cycle	of	misfortune;	and	Allah is	All	Hearing,	
All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kuch	gañwār	woh	haiñ	jo	Allāh	ki	rāh	meiñ	kharch	kareñ	to	use	tāwān	samjheñ	aur	tum	par	
gardisheñ	(masāib)	āane	ke	intiżar	meiñ	raheñ	unhiñ	par	hai	buri	gardish	aur	Allāh	suntā	jāntā	
hai.

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَيَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ قُرُبَـٰتٍ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَصَلَوَٰتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهَا قُرْبَةٌۭ لَّهُمْ ۚ سَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	some	villagers	are	those	who	believe	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day,	and	consider	the	spending	
as	the	means	of	obtaining	proximity	to	Allah and	obtaining	the	prayers	of	the	Noble	Messenger;	
pay	heed!	Yes	indeed	it	is	the	means	of	proximity	for	them;	Allah will	soon	admit	them	into	His	
mercy;	indeed	Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	kuch	gāoñ	wāle	woh	haiñ	jo	Allāh	aur	qiyāmat	par	 Imān	rakhte	haiñ	aur	jo	kharch	kareñ	
use	Allāh	 ki	 nazdikiyoñ	 aur	Rasool	 ki	 duaāen	lene	 kā	 zari'ā	 samjheñ	 hāñ	 hāñ	woh	 un	 ke	liye	
bā’is-e-qurb	hai	Allāh	jald	unheñ	apni	rahmat	meiñ	dākhil	karega	beshak	Allāh	bakhsh	ne	wālā	
meharbān	hai

arabicText: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحْسَـٰنٍۢ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى تَحْتَهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	 leading	 everyone,	 the	 first	 are	 the	
Muhajirs	 *	 and	 the	 Ansar	 **,	 and	 those	
who	 followed	 them	 with	 virtue	- Allah is	
pleased	 with	 them	 and	 they	 are	 pleased	
with	Him,	and	He	has	kept	ready	for	them	
Gardens	 beneath	 which	 rivers	 flow,	 to	
abide	 in	 it	 for	 ever	 and	 ever;	 this	 is	 the	
greatest	 success.	 (*	 The	 immigrants.	
**Those	who	helped	the	immigrants.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 sab	 meiñ	 agle	 pehle	 muhājir	 aur	
ansār	jo	bhalāi	ke	sath	un	ke	pairw	(perwi	
karne)	 wāle	 huwe	 Allāh	 un	 se	 rāzi	 woh	
Allāh	 se	 rāzi	 aur	 unke	 liye	 tayyār	 kar	
rakhe	 haiñ	 bāgh	 jin	 ke	 neeche	 nehreñ		
baheñ	 hamesha	 hamesha	 un	 meiñ	 raheñ	
yahi	badi	kāmyābi	hai

arabicText: وَمِمَّنْ حَوْلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مُنَـٰفِقُونَ ۖ وَمِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ ۖ مَرَدُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ لَا تَعْلَمُهُمْ ۖ نَحْنُ نَعْلَمُهُمْ ۚ سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَّرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	some	of	the	illiterates	around	you	are	
hypocrites;	 and	 some	 of	 the	 people	 of	
Medinah;	hypocrisy	has	become	ingrained	
in	 them;	 you	 do	 not	 know	 them	 *;	 We	
know	 them;	 We	 shall	 soon	 punish	 them	
twice	 **	 - they	 will	 then	 be	 consigned	
towards	the	terrible	punishment.***
(*Until now or as well as We do. ** In life 
and in the grave *** of hell.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tumhāre	 āas	 pās	 ke	 kuch	 gañwār	
munāfiq	haiñ	aur	kuch	madinā	wāle	un	ki	
khu	 (ādat)	 ho	 gai	 hai	 nifāq,	 tum	 unheñ	
nahiñ	 jānte	 hum	 unheñ	 jānte	 haiñ	 jald	
hum	 unheñ	 do	 bār	 ‘azāb	 kareñge	 phir	
bade	ázāb	ki	taraf	phere	jāyeñ	ge
